16590ba6-85a8-42d9-ab71-aa1e9fadbdcd.name: 仆从
16590ba6-85a8-42d9-ab71-aa1e9fadbdcd.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

634b4bed-cb6b-413b-b75c-4cceba180865.name: 感同身受
634b4bed-cb6b-413b-b75c-4cceba180865.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

51f850c2-60b4-40a7-92f1-2d7ad1e7a877.name: 感同身受
51f850c2-60b4-40a7-92f1-2d7ad1e7a877.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

5b709c51-4b39-4d93-a1f5-0f8c826a1dcf.name: 感同身受
5b709c51-4b39-4d93-a1f5-0f8c826a1dcf.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

1a0de034-424c-4916-9bae-f46043e773cc.name: 感同身受
1a0de034-424c-4916-9bae-f46043e773cc.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

91031453-cb17-45fc-8b9b-05a455d14e47.name: 战斗反射
91031453-cb17-45fc-8b9b-05a455d14e47.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

a5921433-1732-443c-a03b-f73daa84ba3e.name: 健康
a5921433-1732-443c-a03b-f73daa84ba3e.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

fc6fafe3-338c-4b83-ac7c-1254403250e2.name: Fit, Very
fc6fafe3-338c-4b83-ac7c-1254403250e2.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)
